info.description: Swagger API for Go Clean Architecture.
info.title: Ecommerce Clean Architecture Swagger API

post.description: Authenticates the user based on the provided credentials and returns access tokens and user info if successful.

409.description: Conflict - Wrong password or Email does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to sign in

post.description: Logs out the authenticated user by invalidating the current session token.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing user ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to sign out

post.description: Registers a new user with the provided details and returns access tokens along with user info if successful.

409.description: Conflict - Email or Name already in use

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to sign up

put.description: Updates the quantity or details of a specific product in the authenticated user's shopping cart.

401.description: Unauthorized - User ID mismatch or authentication failed

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have the required permissions

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred while processing the request

get.description: Fetches the shopping cart details of the authenticated user based on the provided user ID.
get.summary: Retrieve the cart of a user

401.description: Unauthorized - User ID mismatch or authentication failed

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have the required permissions

404.description: Not Found - Cart not found for the given user ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred while processing the request

post.description: Adds a specified product to the authenticated user's shopping cart.
post.summary: Add a product to the user's cart

parameters.description: Product details to add to cart
parameters.name: body

401.description: Unauthorized - User ID mismatch or authentication failed

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have the required permissions

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred while processing the request

delete.description: Removes a specified product from the authenticated user's shopping cart.
delete.summary: Remove a product from the user's cart

parameters.description: Product details to remove from cart
parameters.name: body

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have the required permissions
